participant_1.name: Mary
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: The weather here is very cold , but so beautiful in the spring. I love to ski in the winter. My name is Mary and I am from Colorado. I love to hike in the summer. My favorite band is One Direction.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, with a love for fitness.
participant_2.background: I do not like vegetables. I love to go running. I enjoy spending time with my family. My favorite truck is a Chevy Duramax. My favorite store is American Eagle.

content.text: Hi, my name is Mary and I'm from Colorado.
Hi Mary, I'm (user 2's name) and I'm from Florida.
Oh, cool! How's the weather down there?
It's very hot and humid, but I love it.
I bet! I love the snow here in Colorado, but it can be very cold.
I've never been skiing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's so much fun.
I might just have to do that.
What do you like to do for fun in Florida?
I love to go running, go to the beach, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to hike and go skiing in the summer.
That sounds like a great way to stay active.
It is! I also love to listen to music. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is One Direction.
Oh, I love One Direction too! I saw them in concert last year.
That must have been amazing! I'm so jealous.
It was! They were so good live.
I'm glad you had a good time.
Me too!
Well, it was nice talking to you, Mary.
You too! Have a nice day.
You too.
